title: Serendipity the pink dragon_1989 - Kids movie hard to find!
description:
Long time leech first time uploader.


Childrens movie from 1990. 

As far as the company that made and distributed this movie it's now defunct as seen here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celebrity_Home_Entertainment

for more information about the movie itself here's the wikipedia link: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serendipity_the_Pink_Dragon

*WARNING - the theme song is very sacharrine and infectious. http://www.retrojunk.com/article/show/3324/crazy-chilldhood-serendipity

You've been warned :)


This is a movie that my sister loved as a kid and i couldn't find it anywhere except for used VHS copies, 
which led me to the decision to put it out there... Hope you enjoy!

I'll try to upload scans of the VHS sleeve if i get around to it :P
